channel.title: text mining on Dive into nexus of everything
channel.description: Recent content in text mining on Dive into nexus of everything

item.title: ted
item.description: recommend that you can open the pictures of this page in another window for more details original data library(tidyverse) library(jsonlite) library(tm) library(tidytext) library(wordcloud) library(gutenbergr) library(textdata) library(igraph) library(ggraph) library(widyr) library(topicmodels) main <- read.csv("ted_main.csv") related <- main$related_talks[1] %>% gsub(pattern = "'",replacement = "\"") %>% gsub(pattern = "\"s",replacement = "'s") %>% gsub(pattern = "\\s's",replacement = " \"s") %>% fromJSON() tags <- main$tags[1] %>% str_extract_all(pattern = "\\w+") %>% unlist() load the stopwords of english my_stop <- readLines("english.
